description.narrative: Oxfam seeks to strengthen synergy initiatives among partner organizations that lead agricultural advocacy within the Agricultural Advocacy Group (Groupe de Plaidoyer Agricole) GPA block, reducing destructive tensions and divergences, focusing their efforts on thesame goal and maximizing their advocacy skills. To go from a good intentions trial to the realization of the commitment, He was initiated a project of capacity building of Fopabu and the GPA through (1) A retreat of three days of all the membersof the GPA, (2 ) Advocacy training and (3) a workshop on lessons learned and accountability and reconciliation meetings between members of the GPA Advocacy Group (including FOPABU and CAPAD) Through capacity building, the project aims to revitalize the Forum of Agricultural Producer Organizations of Burundi-Fopabu and its Agricultural Advocacy Group-GPA through a three-day retreat and training of the GPA. The objectives of the project are: (1) revitalize the Farmers' Organizations Forum of Burundi-Fopabu and its Agricultural Advocacy Group-GPA through a three-day retreat, (2) strengthen technical capacity in agricultural advocacy of GPA members, The expected outcomes ofthis project are: (1) the technical capacity in agricultural advocacy of GPA members is strengthened and (2) the FOPABU has acquired the capabilities of the strategic partnership.
